name: Git and Version Control
overview: Version control is a way of keeping track of changes to files over time so that you can recall previous versions when needed and also easily work with other teammates collaboratively
objectives: Basic commands that can be executed via the terminal
What version control is and why it is important
Know examples of version control systems
How to use common git commands

name: Object Oriented Programming
overview: Object oriented programming is a paradigm and a way of thinking that helps programmers effectively model real-life scenarios. In this module, we will cover general OOP concepts and OOP in Python / JavaScript.
objectives: Object oriented programming concepts, classes and objects.
Implement object oriented programming concepts in Python / JavaScript.

name: Test Driven Development
overview: TDD is a software development process in which one writes tests before writing production code thus giving one an opportunity to think through a systems requirements.
objectives: What tests are
How to write tests
How TDD beneficial is to programming
How to debug

name: HTTP and Web Services
overview: This module will cover the fundamentals of web programming and technologies used in programming web pages.
objectives: Basics of HTTP.
Use HTML and CSS to create web pages.
Use Javascript to create interactive web pages.
Basics of MVC.

name: Agile Methodology
overview: At Andela, we know that effective communication is required for use to succeed so we ask questions, request and give feedback, write professionally, speak to be understood and seek  to understand the message being passed. We act, react and communicate in a manner that demonstrates respect for our co workers, partners, ecosystem. We show an acceptance of the organization's mission and hold ourselves to the highest ethical standard
objectives: Principles of effective communication
Importance and benefits of seeking feedback
Approaches for constructively and effectively receiving and giving feedback
Vital rules of business etiquette
What ethics is
Project management tools
